snippet.title: The Songbird Guild - Official Trailer | Ghouls 4 Games
snippet.description: The Songbird Guild is a Yuri RPG/Visual Novel hybrid about magical girls falling in love. Investigate the secrets of a corrupt fantasy world and fight creepy (yet somehow adorable?) monsters in turn-based battles, all to pay the bills in this world where being a magical girl is a regular 9-5 job. Check out the trailer for The Songbird Guild to meet the characters and more ahead of the game's launch in Q2 2025 on PC.
